title: Fivestar4everMVP
author: Fivestar4everMVP
content: I think I am one of the unluckiest gambler/bettor out here, today is one of my worst days again and I think I should quit betting.I went all in on Argentina thinking their match against Saudi Arabia would be an easy win for them, and the fact that the odds were so far away against Saudi Arabia winning while it was in huge favor of Argentina caused me to be so sure that Argentina was going to win the match, and then, I went all in, hoping to make some big wins just like yesterday, but now, everything is gone, in just a twinkle of an eye...Argentina is a big disappointment, It's still hard to believe, I quit betting until I am able to forget this experience entirely.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Sorry about your loss. I know the kind of depression it can give if you lose and staked with high amount of money, but it is good to just use small amount of money which will make you to be at the safest side. Do not chase money in gambling, chase fun. I will advice you to just quite for a while and find a better strategy of using low amount to bet.It is worth saying again, use low amount of money instead, gambling is luck.

comments.author: Queentoshi
comments.body: Sorry about your loss, but it is not just saying you want to stop betting. People have said they wanted to stop betting and gambling many times than they can count, but they are still betting today, something keeps bringing them back. As you lost today, some other people won from that same game and will happily tell people about how they bet on this game and won. That kind of story can be tempting and can make someone who doesn't bet to want to bet, or someone who wants to stop gambling to want to continue.

Well, this is life and gambling. I feel bad about what happened to you. 2-1 in favor of Saudi Arabia. When you've been winning with your former bets, make sure that you're securing a part of those profits so that even if you lost the next bets you make, you've taken a part of it.This may be another worst day for you but just let the day pass and you'll eventually forget about this day as you need to move on so that you'll set your emotion and mind again properly.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on November 22, 2022, 12:33:34 PMArgentina is a big disappointment, It's still hard to believe, I quit betting until I am able to forget this experience entirely. "All in" is usually a mistake. No matter what, surprises can happen. What would you expect, after all?If it was money you afford to lose, I think that as soon as you get other money you afford to lose you should bet again, even small amounts, to keep the games more exciting.Of course, this is an idea; all is up to you. I really hope you've lost only money you did afford to lose and the amount was not that big...

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: Sorry about your loss. You may want to win big by placing big bets but as a result, you experience big losses. That happens often and makes our analysis underestimate what the other party is doing. While we may lose a bit of information, it may be very important information that will affect our decision making.Maybe you need to rest a bit and not watch the World Cup or anything related to sports so you won't be disappointed anymore. And this is a valuable lesson for you, never underestimate the opposing team and don't bet with money you can't afford.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on November 22, 2022, 12:33:34 PMI think I am one of the unluckiest gambler/bettor out here, today is one of my worst days again and I think I should quit betting.@Fivestar4everMVP, that's the risk of betting, gambling like that, today where many bettors fell because they lost to Argentina, the 2022 world cup Saudi Arabia made an impressive appearance on the field before, this is the history of the top in the World Cup, after the victory that was won by the Saudi Arabian team with a score of 2-1, everyone was shocked today, I think many bettors got mentally hit today.Today Saudi Arabia is in the spotlight at the 2022 FIFA World Cup, by defeating Argentina, today before the match started the odds for Saudi Arabia are up to $ 1x $ 25, just imagine if a user places a bet of only $ 100 he will bring home $ 2500, amazing, indeed this is something that gamblers don't think about, they all score for Argentina, @Fivestar4everMVP patience, I'm sure you will succeed in football betting the next day, cheers.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: I'm so sorry for your bad experience.You shouldn't go all in in the first match, is important to see how the teams are playing before placing the bets. And Argentina show us how they have lionel messi but they don't have a team, and that's a big problem because lionel against 11 is a loosing match even if the opponent team isn't that good.

You said this yesterday but you have to understand that football is a game luck, there is no best team in the game of football. If you see what Saudi Arabia played today you would understand that football is not by profession. Messi could not played anything. Saudi Arabia team was very strong in physical attacks and was good in the defense. The first goal that scored by Messi made Saudi Arabia team to be very strong and attacked . Argentina was playing offside match and the trap was set by Saudi Arabia defense. Argentina was not wise enough to notice that plan. They were just playing to score while they were in a very serious trap. I believed they have learn their lesson. Let see their next match.

Is the bet that you have made big enough for Argentina? It is truly unbelievable that the national team that we are championing has suffered such a crushing defeat. I also bet on Argentina but for a small amount, so I'm not too disappointed, the only thing that disappointed me was the team's performance. This is football, the Saudi Arabia national team was able to show that they can compete. if the not disallowed destination was official your story might be different. It's okay if you're going to take a break to cool off from the bet. Because psychologically you must be quite depressed. In big stakes, especially the world cup, there are still many people who lose more than you have. Back to the initial setup, the bet doesn't force you, you come with your own awareness of the agreed risk.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: Why are you putting all your money on Argentina while the World Cup matches are still long away this shouldn't be done and don't be too greedy even though you believe in a team that will win 100% but in reality it is a loss for Argentina, but once again I'm sorry about lose your money in this game.This is a risk in betting, we have to accept the harsh reality even though this is unacceptable to you, I'm sure you must have regretted it before but just make this a lesson in the future, don't place all bets on one game, I didn't do that just in case a team that is the favorite loses because any bet can happen.Well for her I don't get involved in big bets.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on November 22, 2022, 12:33:34 PMI think I am one of the unluckiest gambler/bettor out here, today is one of my worst days again and I think I should quit betting.I went all in on Argentina thinking their match against Saudi Arabia would be an easy win for them, and the fact that the odds were so far away against Saudi Arabia winning while it was in huge favor of Argentina caused me to be so sure that Argentina was going to win the match, and then, I went all in, hoping to make some big wins just like yesterday, but now, everything is gone, in just a twinkle of an eye...Argentina is a big disappointment, It's still hard to believe, I quit betting until I am able to forget this experience entirely. You've made two mistakes; betting all in and depending too much on gambling. No matter how obvioud the advantage is, on your bet, it will always be better to bet an amount that you can endure losing. It might be at the edge but this is gambling man; anything can happen, such as the unexpected. Also, I think you are hoping that much to win big time (well not to be a hypocrite, for sure many gamblers as well but to be that upset is something). It is okay to hope for a better outcome, we all do. But always have a plan B. Bet only without expectations that it will make you rich. Bet because you just want to win. The higher your expectations are, the bigger its impact on your end. Much better to just play it safely. Rest if you need it, come back if you still want to.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: I am also disappointed with Argentina because my bet lost, I know this is not going all in so this doesn't make me a second mistake, it's not only you who feel a big loss maybe other people are the same but other people have reserve funds while you don't so you are deeply regretted in this match.But obviously all in was a mistake, I feel how I did it before, this made my biggest mistake so now I don't do it anymore and I'm more on regular bets than having to go all in.But will you finish here? I think you have to start again from the beginning to never do this at least we can feel about big losses in an instant.But get up I believe you will win again.

comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on November 22, 2022, 12:33:34 PMI think I am one of the unluckiest gambler/bettor out here, today is one of my worst days again and I think I should quit betting.I went all in on Argentina thinking their match against Saudi Arabia would be an easy win for them, and the fact that the odds were so far away against Saudi Arabia winning while it was in huge favor of Argentina caused me to be so sure that Argentina was going to win the match, and then, I went all in, hoping to make some big wins just like yesterday, but now, everything is gone, in just a twinkle of an eye...Argentina is a big disappointment, It's still hard to believe, I quit betting until I am able to forget this experience entirely. I know what you mean. Nobody expected Saudi Arabia to gain the upper hand over Argentina. But moments like these do happen, rarely, but they do happen. Just like when Germany scored 7 goals against Brasil. You would have thought that there was no way Brasil would have been such an easy win, but it was one. Whenever one of these "miracles" happen, I usually think to myself: Perhaps these matches are fixed? But in the end we have to accept our losses over these freak events and move on with our lives.Better luck next time!

Ohh that is really to bad to hear, OP. I guess this is the sign where you should take a break from gambling. Well, even if sportsbetting has a lower chance of losing compared to other kinds of gambling method (e.g. cards, slots, etc.), I guess the odds are not in your favour today.You deserve to take the break and rest. The system is slowly eating your insanity. I do commend you OP for deciding to stop since most gamblers tend to gamble again whenever they experience a loss in hopes of recovering it. Take a break and explore other options of entertainment for the meantime!

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Shit happens. And happens all the time. You aren't the only one who lost.The timing sometimes can be very frustrating. At one point you get excited and already have in mind what will happen and you celebrate your winning and then an upset happen. If you are just in MMA sports, you sure will have tons of this feeling. Breathe and just watch out for another game, maybe the next game will make you win.

comments.author: GiftedMAN
comments.body: First off, sorry you lost in your bet but as a gambler, you ought to be used to a situation where the underdog defeats the bigger team in a football game. What happened in the case of the Argentina and Saudi Arabia match was a clear indication that football is not by the squad or big names in a team rather it is by good performance and the ability of a team to utilize every given opportunity to covert it to goals and that was what the Saudi Arabian team did today. There is a popular saying and I think it is attributed to the gamble enthusiasts, winners never quit, quitters never win so if you want to win again, never say never and remember to gamble with an amount you can afford to lose.
